label: Anti-malware system maintenance and updates
quote: The contractor shall provide all maintenance for the system providing the anti-malware capabilities to include configuration, definition updates, and comply with DHSâ€™ configuration management / release management requirements when changes are required.

label: Weekly anti-malware alert reporting to DHS COTR
quote: A summary of alerts shall be reported to DHS COTR in weekly status reports.

label: Notify DHS of anomalies per incident response plan
quote: If an abnormality or anomaly is identified, the contractor shall notify the appropriate DHS point of contact in accordance with the incident response plan.

label: Patch management services and deployment
quote: The Contractor shall perform provide patch management services. The contractor shall push patches that are required by vendors and the DHS system owner.

label: Deploy patches as directed by DHS
quote: the contractor shall be responsible for deploying patches as directed by DHS.

label: Test applications in test environment prior to deployment
quote: It is recommended that all other applications (host-based intrusion detection system (HIDS), network intrusion detection system (NIDS), Anti-malware, and Firewall) shall be tested by the contractor prior to deployment in a test environment.

label: Retain log files online and offline for specified periods
quote: Log files for all infrastructure devices, physical access, and anti-malware should be retained online for 180 days and offline for three years.
